basic_information.scholarship_name: Enid L. Jackson Endowed Graduate Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Enid L. Jackson Endowed Graduate Scholarshi
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing their masters degree in Elementary Education, Early Childhood Education, or Special Education. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to any graduate student who is pursuing their masters degree in Elementary Education, Teaching and Learning PK - 6, Early Childhood Education, or Special Education Has completed at least (12) graduate hours Demonstrates financial need and personal career goals Has an intent to teach after receiving degree Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
